alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 19 at 1:45AM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Wind chill readings as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Kansas, Greeley County. In Nebraska, Dundy County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Increased potential for frostbite and hypothermia. Frostbite may occur on exposed skin in less than 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chill readings are expected to occur around sunrise this morning.
info.instruction: Use caution when traveling outside. Make sure to wear appropriate clothing. Dress in multiple layers, including a hat and gloves.
